entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

Temperature: 0.7°C

Visibility: 19.3 km

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to a few rain showers and drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and drizzle ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
